page.title: 02Organisations
page.content: Members of the undermentioned clubs and organisations come from within and also from areas outside the villages. Rushmere Baptist church has Boys' Brigade, Company and Junior Sections, and Girls' Brigade - Brigaders and Explorers. Bealings villages have a Girl Guide company and Brownies. 'Bealings, playford and culpho club' is for retired people and senior citizens, with summer outings and winter talks. Bealings has a badminton club and a snooker club. Playford and (joint) Bealings both have Women' Institutes, which met once a month but give opportunities for joint evens with institutes outside the area. Women's Institues are an important and wel-respected part of any village's composition.
